meanings.definition: To engage in logrolling (noun: the exchanging of favors or support, especially in politics)
meanings.sent1: During the election, the candidates logrolled to gain more votes.
meanings.sent2: Politicians often logroll to secure alliances and pass legislation.
meanings.sent3: The two friends logrolled by helping each other with their homework.
meanings.sent4: In the world of politics, logrolling is like a dance of favors and support.
meanings.sent5: She logrolled her way to the top by making deals with other politicians.
